narration_text: The biting wind whips around you, Sinbad, carrying the stench of decay. You find yourself standing before an abandoned gas station, its windows boarded up and a rusted 'Help Wanted' sign swaying precariously. Cars litter the forecourt, some overturned, others stripped bare. A thick layer of grime coats everything, a testament to the chaos that has consumed the world. The air is heavy with an unsettling silence, broken only by the occasional groan that seems to emanate from the shadows. This is your new reality, Sinbad. A fight for survival in a world overrun by the undead.

dialogue.speaker: Sinbad
dialogue.text: Damn... this is it, huh? Guess I'm on my own.

active_objectives.description: Survive the first day in this new world.

history_entry: Sinbad begins his journey in a world overrun by the undead, finding himself at an abandoned gas station.

interactive_elements.name: Gas Station Door
interactive_elements.description: The boarded-up entrance to the gas station. Appears weak.

potential_outcomes.success: Access to the gas station interior.

interactive_elements.name: Abandoned Cars
interactive_elements.description: Various cars, some wrecked, some seemingly untouched.

ambient_events.description: A faint, guttural groan echoes from down the road.

world_info.name: The Walking Dead
world_info.description: A post-apocalyptic world overrun by hordes of undead 'walkers'. Humanity struggles to survive in scattered settlements, facing constant threats from both the undead and other desperate survivors.

The Outbreak: Initial outbreak of the zombie virus.
